channel.title: 搭建 on Zhou Jun's blog
channel.description: Recent content in 搭建 on Zhou Jun's blog

item.title: Hugo博客搭建记录
item.description: 本地搭建流程 hugo new site blog cd blog git clone https://github.com/olOwOlo/hugo-theme-even themes/even 更改文件位置exampleSite hugo server –theme=even –buildDrafts 部署到远端githu hugo –theme=even –baseUrl=“https://junzhoublog.github.io/" cd public git init git remote add origin https://github.com/junzhoublog/junzhoublog.github.io.git git add -A cd ../.. git config –global user.email “1158290245@qq.com” git
